title: Electives specialization
content:
Does choosing an elective specialization really matter? 
In my 6th semester, I want to select an elective that genuinely interests me, even though it doesn’t align with the other electives (1 and 2) I’ve already chosen. I’m certain about taking Blockchain, but I’m unsure about my 4th elective. 
Any suggestions?

comments.body: In my honest opinion, i feel specialization is not useful in masters / placements both

Okay ! 
Any suggestions for the 4th elective ? HP or DBT ? 
I have taken BD as my 2nd elective ,so I think it should be helpful for DBT . But any suggestions though ? Which one is scoring ?
Both are good electives. In EC last year, HP got cancelled due to low strength, so I had to take DBT. It was chill.
